name: Tally
story: Tally grew up in a small town in Poland. He was quiet and withdrawn as a child, but always had a sharp mind. After his parents died in a car accident, Tally turned to the streets to survive. It was there that he was recruited by a group of assassins who saw potential in him. Tally quickly rose through the ranks and became known for his deadly accuracy with a shotgun. He now serves as a private in the INDEPENDENT faction, but his true loyalty lies with the assassins who saved him.
